title: Hasty
description:
There are many generators for WordPress, but Hasty really saves you time. Don’t believe it? Then try out a WP generator from Hasty, wheter it’s the shortcode generator, the custom-post-type generator or the Meta Box Generator, you're going to speed up your development time with just a few clicks.

Hasty is the best way to generate custom code for your WordPress project easily and fast.
